item.description:
Come visit the Ecotarium with the Greater Worcester Humanists! Lots of interesting science exhibits, as well as many live animals, including a polar bear, river otters, and hissing cockroaches!

This one's extra family-friendly, so bring the kids along! There's plenty to see & learn for both kids & adults!

From their website:
The EcoTarium is a unique indoor-outdoor museum in Worcester, MA. Set in an urban oasis, the EcoTarium offers a chance to walk through the treetops, take a thrilling multimedia journey through the galaxy at a digital planetarium, meet wildlife, stroll nature trails, ride a narrow-gauge railroad, and get hands-on with family-friendly exhibits.
item.name: Humanist Excursion - Ecotarium
